verbs.description: White House officials [V: are] reportedly wondering if Rudy Giuliani is just a flash in the pan like fellow New Yorker and Trump pal Anthony Scaramucci .
[ARG0: White House officials] are [ARGM-ADV: reportedly] [V: wondering] [ARG1: if Rudy Giuliani is just a flash in the pan like fellow New Yorker and Trump pal Anthony Scaramucci] .
White House officials are reportedly wondering if [ARG1: Rudy Giuliani] [V: is] [ARG2: just a flash in the pan like fellow New Yorker and Trump pal Anthony Scaramucci] .
